features: [Oil-Gathering Advantage] Enjoy the convenience of our innovative frying pan, which has a remarkable bottom oil-gathering feature that ensures a pristine cooking surface, reduces food stickiness, encourages delicious meals, and simplifies cleanup. The stainless steel skillet with lid is a kitchen essential for culinary enthusiasts seeking effortless and enjoyable cookinghe stainless steel skillet with lid is a kitchen essential for culinary enthusiasts seeking effortless and enjoyable cooking

[Elegant and Functional Design] The Oil Gather Pro stainless steel pan effortlessly combines refined aesthetics with exceptional cooking performance. The 11 inches professional pot with glass cover, polished finish and ergonomic stay-cool long handle harmonize seamlessly with any kitchen decor, elevating your tabletop presentation. This practical pan, with its generous 2.36inches depth and even heating, caters to all your culinary needs, making it ideal for everyday cooking

[Enhanced Flavor Retention] Equipped with a glass lid, this stainless steel skillet effectively locks in moisture and nutrients, resulting in nutritious and more flavorful dishes. The glass cover, which has a steam vent, snugly fits the tapered rim, preventing unwanted drips or spills during pouring. For quick cleanup after cooking, just do a simple hand wash or use the dishwasher to clean the cooking pan

[High Quality] This oil gather pro skillet is made of the food grade stainless steel and 3-ply heavy bottom, the induction frying pan is free of the PFOA PFTE, which ensures rapid heat absorption, resistance to rust, and exceptional durability. Enjoy faster cooking with even heat distribution at low to medium heat settings, providing a nonstick-like cooking experience while conserving energy

[Multi-Purpose Use] This multipurpose stainless steel pan is great for frying food, searing steak for dinner, and making eggs for breakfast. Designed to cater to both home cooks and professional chefs, pot's comfortable handle ensures a secure, cool-to-touch grip. The frying pan with lid stainless steel is suitable for all cooktops, including induction, ceramic, electric, or gas. The skillet with cover also transitions effortlessly from stove to oven, oven safe up to 500°F without the lid or 350°F with the lid

[How to Achieve Non-stick?] To achieve the ideal non-stick effect with stainless steel pans, begin by preheating the pan over medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Drop water into the pan to check the temperature. If the water droplets evaporate quickly due to high temperature, it means the pan is not hot enough. If the water droplets swirl on the surface of the pan, adjust to low heat, and spray cooking oil. Then, put the food in the pan for cooking to achieve a non-stick effect

[How to Clean Stubborn Stains?] If your stainless steel pot has stubborn stains, try these tips: Squeeze the juice of half a lemon into the dirty pot and add the lemon peel. Pour in some baking soda and white vinegar, then boil over medium-low heat, stirring for about 2-3 minutes. Afterward, wipe the pot with a clean cloth and rinse with water. It's recommended to wipe the pot with a dry rag before storing it

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Discover Culinary Perfection Unleash your inner chef with the Oil Gather Pro skillet, accompanied by a sleek tempered glass lid, allowing you to effortlessly master the art of cooking with its innovative oil-gathering feature. Ensure healthier meals and exceptional heat distribution for gourmet results on any cooktop.

The ordinary pan and the Oil Gather Pro skillet differ significantly in their design and features. The ordinary frying pan typically has a regular flat bottom, whereas the Oil Gather Pro skillet incorporates an innovative bottom oil-gathering feature. This unique design of the Oil Gather Pro skillet efficiently collects excess oil at the center of the bottom, reducing food sticking and making cooking healthier and cleanup easier.

Unleash Culinary Versatility Our exceptional stainless steel skillet with lid is your kitchen's all-star, designed to conquer any cooktop as the induction gas electric ceramic with ease, ensuring effortless and delicious meals for any occasion. Embrace the convenience of dishwasher and oven safety, making cleanup a breeze and opening up endless culinary possibilities for your gastronomic delights.

Unlock culinary perfection with our professional-grade tempered glass lid, offering a crystal-clear view of your skillet creations, secure fit, and easy maintenance, elevating your cooking experience to new heights of precision and elegance Experience unparalleled cooking performance with our tri-ply impact-bonded base oil gather pro frying pan, ensuring exceptional heat distribution for perfect culinary results every time. Our premium skillet not only boasts a long stay-cool handle for comfortable and safe cooking, but also features a thoughtful hanging hole, adding both convenience and style to your kitchen. Hang it with pride, always within reach, as you embark on your culinary adventures with ease and elegance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pan is a game changer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pan for my husband for Christmas after we had learned how to use stainless steel pans on social media (thanks Steel Pan Guy). It cooks beautifully when used correctly. The fact that meat sticks until it's "ready" is so helpful to know, it truly has changed how we cook. The pan feels very heavy and sturdy. I do wish that this pan was solid construction because it does have a sort of plate at the bottom (not all one piece) but it is still useful and a good intro pan. We are able to make meat and use the fond for pan sauces and it has us eating like we're at a 5 star restaurant often. It is that good. Once you know how to use it right, it is life changing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and useful.
reviews.reviewText: Larger than I wanted and yet is great for large meals. Pan is heavy and heats quickly, holds heat well and browns meat well with a bit of oil. Handle stays somewhat cool, the lid handle can become too hot requiring a hot pad when handling. Clean up is not too difficult. I'd recommend this pan and lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pan. Im moving away from using the coated nonstick pans. They always seem to get scratched up. This pan is fantastic. It cooks great it’s easy to clean up and nothing sticks to it. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks beautiful. Very heavy and seems worth the high price.First time it was used it stained very easily.Very disappointed for how expensive it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teniendo en cuenta las recomendaciones de uso, la sartén es óptima
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta la sensación de cocinar con un material que no contamina mi comida. tiene un tamaño que permite cocinar para varias personas. Hay que seguir las instrucciones de precalentamiento y manejo delicado de la temperatura que se aplican a todos los productos de acero inoxidable. Es una sartén pesada, pero es agradable el peso. Tiene buena distribución de calor. Es un producto agradable para usar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy it.
reviews.reviewText: I hate this skillet everything sticks to it doesn't clean easy would not buy another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware sharp edges
reviews.reviewText: Overall I was impressed once I opened the box. Both the pan and lid were packaged well. Both easy to wash. My one complaint would be the end of the handle has sharp edges , should have been rounded during finishing process . The handle however did not get hot whilst cooking. Seems to be well made overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it advertises
reviews.reviewText: I own a lot of very good non-stick pans, but this has become my go-to pan for frying chicken breasts, salmon and white fish. Haven't tried it with eggs yet but it does breakfast sausage admirably. It is so nice to pour oil into this pan and watch it gather in a pool in the middle of the pan instead of running off to one side. My only problem, not having used stainless steel pans before, was heating properly before adding oil. I was using a laser thermometer, and the pan didn't seem to be heating up very fast on my induction stove. As a consequence, the pan was overheating, sometimes to over 600 degrees. The thermometer was giving me a false reading. When I finally figured out my error, things have been fine. I do love this pan and will consider Deluxe cookware if the need arises for another piece of stainless steel cookware.
